data.name: Hell Let Loose – Red Marshall
data.detailed_description:
With Red Marshall you can take command of the front lines with this unique uniform for the Soviet Forces Commander role. Lead your troops onto the battlefield with the "Soviet M35 Officer" uniform.

Red Marshall pack contains

Soviet Forces - "M35 Officer" uniform
data.about_the_game:
With Red Marshall you can take command of the front lines with this unique uniform for the Soviet Forces Commander role. Lead your troops onto the battlefield with the "Soviet M35 Officer" uniform.

Red Marshall pack contains

Soviet Forces - "M35 Officer" uniform
data.short_description: With Red Marshall you can take command of the front lines with this unique uniform for the Soviet Forces Commander role. Lead your troops onto the battlefield with the "Soviet M35 Officer" uniform.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB /AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
